attributes.action: allow present physiotherapist from non EU countries to be given equal opportunities.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: currently physiotherapist from non EU countries who are working in the NHS will find it difficult to change jobs or get promotion as the UK and non eu physiotherapists would be given the first choice after the physiotherapist has been removed from the shortage occupation list. they are now treated as second class residents.
